product_name: REI Midweight Long Underwear Bottoms - Infants'/Toddlers'
long_description: The REI Midweight Long Underwear Bottoms for infants and toddlers offer a soft feel and all-day warmth. Polyester fabric draws moisture away from the skin and dries quickly; fabric also provides UPF 50+ protection. A touch of spandex offers stretch and shape retention; peached finish enhances softness. Flat seams eliminate bulk while rib-knit ankle cuffs help seal out cold. The REI Midweight Long Underwear Bottoms have a gusseted center panel that provides infants and toddlers with a full range of motion.
short_description: The REI Midweight Long Underwear Bottoms for infants and toddlers offer a soft feel and all-day warmth.
